snippet.title: Flexible Frosty Pre-release Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Put on your mittens and your beanie to discover an icy world in this retro arcade-style game from the heyday of the GameBoy.

Cool features included:
- 1 little & cute flexible penguin
- GameBoy-like graphics and audio
- Wholesome & family friendly
- Approximately ~2 hours long
- 40 short levels filled with unique puzzles
- 40 ice creams to collect as an additional challenge
- 15 achievements for completionist lovers
- An optional binocular view to help you solve larger levels
- Mouse, keyboard, and full gamepad support

Coming to Steam on Q4 2025.
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3256890/Flexible_Frosty/

Press kit: https://flexiblefrosty.sleepingpanda.games/

This is a Steam pre-release video trailer.
Gameplay and content may be different after release.
